attributes.action: review and/or remove the admin fee for photocard driving licences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to have the £20 fee removed or reduced to below £5 for the update of a photocard style driving licence.

I feel that after having paid out for a provisional, taking lessons, theory test and practical test that having to pay a further £20 every 10 years is extortion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
